Method Detail

init

public void init()
Init the internal state of transformation

apply

public abstract Population apply(Population population)
Transforms the given population to another population according to its rules. Also updates the statistical information of the transformation process

Parameters:
population - The population to be transformed
Returns:
A new population built from the given population

statistics

public Result statistics(Population population)
Return the statistical information of the population given. includes information of the transformation process if any

Parameters:
population - Population used to calculate the statistical information
Returns:
Statistical Information of the transformation process
